about_the_game:
Embark on a gripping journey in Nose, Breathing Rebellion, a 2D action-platformer set in a dark, satirical world. Navigate through a beautifully crafted dystopia, utilizing stealth, strategy, and puzzle-solving to escape the clutches of the malevolent Kovalev.

As the protagonist Nose, you'll face challenges designed to test your wit and resolve, pushing you to liberate a city suffocated by hate. This game blends atmospheric storytelling with a hauntingly stark aesthetic, offering an unforgettable experience of rebellion and freedom.

Features:

  • Atmospheric 2D Platforming: Traverse a dark, oppressive world with intricate levels that demand precision and strategy.
  • Stealth Mechanics: Avoid detection and outsmart enemies using the environment to your advantage, emphasizing strategy over direct confrontation.
  • Immersive Narrative: Experience a story that intertwines satire and dystopia, where every element from gameplay to visuals contributes to the overarching theme of rebellion.

As the protagonist Nose, you'll face challenges designed to test your wit and resolve, pushing you to liberate a city suffocated by hate. This game blends atmospheric storytelling with a hauntingly stark aesthetic, offering an unforgettable experience of rebellion and freedom.

name: Nose: Breathing Rebellion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sistema operativo de 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Face factories of hate and gas-filled tubes to liberate the city in this 2D action-platformer set in a dark satirical world filled with puzzles and adventure. Welcome to a future, or past, dystopia where your determination pave the way to liberation.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
